aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.description1: We are Shoot Ang. We have a long history in establishing startups and digital marketing and media for over 150 brands. We have faced the challenges related to client projects and achieved significant numbers and results in our digital transformation journey. We have left our unique and initial mark in the market, through which we were able to
aboutUs.description2: in a different way and competitive quality to support Saudi products, making it easier for us to market the product according to the standards of success and manufacturing, avoiding duplicated projects and product replication.
aboutUs.description3: Since the beginning of our journey, with our complete reliance on analysis, monitoring, project management, advertising, and marketing, Shoot Eng now supports the product from manufacturing to marketing for all its clients. The name Shoot Eng reflects the company’s vision and way of working. We work passionately to hit our clients' marketing goals and increase their sales.
aboutUs.description4: Throughout the journey, and due to the large number of clients in northern and central Riyadh, we moved to our third headquarters where we expanded the space, studio, and green area, helping our team create a natural environment for work and creativity that suits our clients.

services_2.title: Our Services
services_2.description_1: We offer a range of services to help you achieve your business goals.
services_2.description_2: Our team is dedicated to providing high-quality solutions tailored to your needs.
services_2.highlight_brand: Establish and highlight the brand identity to distinguish emerging companies and showcase their essence through a set of values, characteristics, and symbols that can give them a distinctive position in competition with other companies.
services_2.start_project: We start your project by entering our operating rooms, which are our special place consisting of several studio shoot rooms - the idea incubation room and the content room - and a team meeting room. From here, the project begins with artistic creativity.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description1: Shot Ing is distinguished as the first agency that supports the product from industry to marketing, as it uses its first weapon, which is content marketing. The quality of the product is its primary goal, upon which the successful marketing strategy is built.
industry.description2: Due to Shot Ing's experience in the industry and quality standards, it helps upcoming project owners by adjusting quality standards and choosing new crafts that can provide them with the best industrial values, supported by delving into the fine details to the quality and professionalism of the external appearance.

welcome.message: Our approach is a language, and we are its letters. With your presence, our meanings are complete.
welcome.title: Welcome, and a warm welcome to you.

department.title: Employment Department
department.description: At Shoot Ing, our employees are referred to as merchants of taste. We trade and sell taste before it becomes a product or service. We are looking for distinguished individuals with refined taste, who have both artistic talent and sufficient knowledge of market trends and creative experiences, to become our partners in this journey.

training.title: Training Department
training.description: This department is dedicated to individuals with talents and visions in the artistic and marketing fields, to join our team. The department aims to develop knowledge and skills, gaining the necessary experience to participate in the job market.

seo_improve.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
seo_improve.description: Boost your site's visibility and enhance visitor engagement

onPage.title: On-Page SEO Optimization
onPage.content: Improve internal elements like keywords, titles, and meta tags to enhance search engine ranking, while optimizing the site structure and user experience to boost search engine performance.

offPage.title: Off-Page SEO Optimization
offPage.content: Implement off-page strategies such as link building and improving online presence through promotional activities, managing online reputation, and optimizing it through various strategies.

writingArticles.title: Writing Articles
writingArticles.content: Craft relevant, engaging articles to help improve your site’s ranking on search engines. This includes researching keywords and ensuring content aligns with SEO best practices.

seo_improve.passion_statement: We work passionately... to hit the target
seo_improve.video_unavailable: Your browser does not support the video tag.
seo_improve.offer_description: We build a comprehensive strategy aimed at enhancing your site’s visibility and increasing visitor engagement with its content. We lay the fundamental pillars to ensure your website's effective and strong presence in search engine results.
seo_improve.google_core_vitals: Compliance with Google Core Web Vitals

social_media.cover_all_aspects: We cover all aspects of your brand's digital presence across all social media platforms.

section_one.title: Audience Analysis and Suitable Platforms
section_one.description: We begin by deeply understanding your target audience in terms of age group, interests, buying habits, and the places they spend their time. Then we identify the most effective platforms to engage with them.

section_two.title: Social Media Marketing Strategy
section_two.description: We develop a comprehensive strategy that suits your brand's goals, including content planning, where we create a detailed plan for the content we will publish, the appropriate times for posting, and the targeted platforms.

section_three.title: Social Account Management
section_three.description: Our team of specialists manages your accounts on social media platforms, focusing on creating inspiring and engaging content, as well as overseeing daily interactions with your audience. We strive to provide a unique experience for every follower, increasing brand loyalty.

section_four.title: Content Creation
section_four.description: We produce high-quality content suitable for each platform, whether it is images, videos, texts, or designs, to ensure that the content aligns with your brand identity and clearly and creatively expresses your message.

section_five.title: Social Media Advertising
section_five.description: We use targeted advertising to enhance your brand's visibility and attract new customers, providing tailored advertising campaigns designed to increase sales, engagement, and customer acquisition; with continuous performance optimization.

section_six.title: Analysis and Reporting
section_six.description: We provide periodic reports that include performance analysis on social media, including engagement rates, reach, growth, and return on investment, to evaluate the success of campaigns and adjust strategies to ensure goals are achieved.

section_seven.title: Engagement and Community Management
section_seven.description: Engaging with followers is a vital part of our strategy. We monitor comments, messages, and responses on social media, and work to manage any issues or inquiries promptly and effectively; enhancing trust and credibility for the brand.

social_media.passion_statement: We work passionately... to hit the target.
social_media.offer_description_1: We believe in the importance of social media as a fundamental tool for the success of any business in the digital age.
social_media.offer_description_2: We provide comprehensive services to manage and develop your presence on these platforms.
social_media.contactUs_2: Feel free to contact us for the necessary consultation

photos.header: The Art of Bringing Visions to Life
photos.description1: We transform ideas into vibrant images... to convey your message clearly

section1.title: Photography
section1.content: We create details that reflect quality, focusing on precision to set your project apart with high quality, as well as on the basic elements and materials to enhance the scene and convey your targeted message.

section2.title: Editing and Professional Touches
section2.content: It’s the process of coloring and merging scenes to create a cohesive visual and artistic message. The editor writes the work in the editing room after reading what the director has scripted.

section3.title: Photography Space for Rent
section3.content: An indoor studio inspiring creativity with outdoor locations featuring green landscapes, overlooking the multi-angled towers of the Kingdom, allowing the photographer to create images that fit the intended idea and message.

section4.title: Production and Artistic Direction
section4.content: Filming cinematic videos, commercial ads, and social media content, involving (storyboarding - idea approval - equipment preparation - coordination - filming - editing - final approval)

section5.title: Audio Production and Sound Engineering
section5.content: Recording and refining audio through technical devices and sound engineering, producing podcasts, music, and sound effects to create an experience aligned with your vision.
